description:
After reining in some renegade police officers, Kenshin is recognized as the Samurai whose bravery helped establish the Meiji Era and is asked to rejoin the army.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Celui qui a effacé le passé
Kanashimi no Kenshi: Kako o Kiru Otoko
Kederli Kılıç Ustası / Geçmişini Silen Adam
O Homem que Matou o Passado
ดาบอำมหิตจิตใจอ่อน
哀しみの剣士・過去を斬る男
